desc: 味方単体のＢＢゲージを最大にする

dictionary.lore: A potion distributed by the Akras Summoners’ Hall. It is said that the Akras Summoners’ Hall based the synthesis method of their commonly available Fujin Potion on this potion. Both have similar effects and are used in the same way. Their only major difference is the ease with which they can be carried, an area in which the highly portable Fujin Potion beats its larger counterpart hands down.

name: 真武神薬
